title: Indian Hotels launches restaurant brand Loya in Bengaluru
description: Indian Hotels Company (IHCL) is launching its flagship Indian-concept restaurant brand, Loya, at the Taj West End in Bengaluru. Loya captures the culinary traditions of North India and will also be launched at The Taj Mahal in Mumbai. The F&B segment contributes significantly to IHCL's revenues. The menu revives lost culinary traditions and uses authentic recipes made with heirloom ingredients.
